data.details:
Public Speaker (C)
Grades: 6, 7, 8
They call it stage presence: the ability to be yourself and make a connection with people, even a crowd of people, and seem comfortable the entire time. And a great presenter's talent for conveying your points clearly and powerfully is useful everywhere, not just in on the stage. Luckily, you don't have to be born with these skills; you can develop them. You might even have the chance to perform at the Riverside Art Walk Poetry Festival the evening of April 6, 2016.
*This event is for 2016 registered Girl Scouts, and registered & approved adult volunteers.
* For safety and supervision reasons, troops and individuals are not permitted to bring non-Girl Scouts or siblings. 
*Girl/adult ratios must be followed and adults are expected to stay on the premises during the event. 

$15/girl, $1/adult
Contact: Brittany McCallister 904.389.3071
